sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.getReferenceQualReferenceQualifier</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>getReferenceQualReferenceQualifier</name> <script><![CDATA[function getReferenceQualReferenceQualifier() { return 'active=true^available_for_ref_qual=1^field_type.name=reference^table=' + current.reference; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.james</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2013-07-11 17:42:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8fecb7305f220100a9ad2572f2b4777c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>getReferenceQualReferenceQualifier</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Dynamic Operands for Dictionary" source="com.glide.dynamic_operands.dict">af3d34476d2220100acb70b3534330b9</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8fecb7305f220100a9ad2572f2b4777c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-02-20 23:39:29</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>150</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
